EmailTemplate.name: AA_ETS_To_CIManager
EmailTemplate.subject: A new competitor agent report has been forwarded for your review: {!aa_Agent_Report__c.Report_Title__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
A new competitor agent report {!aa_Agent_Report__c.Link} has been forwarded by {!aa_Agent_Report__c.LastModifiedBy} for you to review. Please Click here to Approve/Reject the report. Mobile: com.salesforce.salesforce1://entity/view?entityId={!aa_Agent_Report__c.Id}
Desktop: {!aa_Agent_Report__c.Link} PS: This is an auto generated mail, please do not reply.
Thanks, The Agent
